actions.committee: Senate Committee on Public Works (Subsequently: Environment and Public Works)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works (Subsequently: Environment and Public Works).
Pursuant to S. Res. 4, Committee name changed.
Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged in Senate (Pursuant to S. Res. 4).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Alcohol-Impaired Driver Act of 1977."

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from approving any State's highway safety program unless such State has enacted legislation which prescribes a minimum ten day jail sentence or comparable alternative service for persons found guilty of driving while under the influence of alcohol and requires participation in an alcohol safety program by persons found guilty of such an offense.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Alcohol-Impaired Driver Act of 1977."
